sen.j: 宇多天皇は即位前から既に藤原胤子や橘義子らの妃との間に子女をもうけていたが、阿衡事件などでこじれていた基経との関係改善のためにも、温子入内は不可欠であった。
sen.e: Although Emperor Udai had already had sons and daughters with FUJIWARA no Inshi, TACHIBANA no Yoshiko, and other empresses, he had to allow Onshi to enter into the imperial court to improve the relationship with Mototsune, her father, which had been damaged by the Ako Incident (a political incident in the Heian period that showed that the Fujiwara clan had more power than the Emperor).

sen.j: 一人娘均子内親王を産んだものの皇子には恵まれなかったため、胤子没後にその所生の東宮敦仁親王（のちの醍醐天皇）を猶子とした。
sen.e: As she did not have a prince although she had a daughter, Imperial Princess Kinshi, she adopted the son of Inshi, Imperial Prince Atsugimi, who later became Emperor Daigo.

sen.j: 陵墓は宇治陵（京都府宇治市木幡中村）。
sen.e: Onshi's tome is one of Uji ryo (a group of tombs of the Fujiwara clan scattered in Uji City) located in Kohata Nakamura, Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture).
